shave.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to cut off hair very close to the skin, especially from the face, using a razor
shave.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She shaved her legs and underarms.
shave.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to remove very thin pieces from the surface of something
shave.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Shave thin strips of cheese over the pasta.
shave.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if a man has a shave, he cuts off the hair on his face close to his skin using a razor
shave.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He looked as if he needed a shave.
I’ll just have a shave before we go.
